sentences.sContent: ...a Roman villa which once housed a fine collection of mosaics.
sentences.sCn: …一座曾藏有一批精美的马赛克收藏品的罗马别墅。

phrases.pCn: 玻璃马赛克；玻璃镶嵌砖
马赛克玻璃；五彩玻璃；花玻璃，锦玻璃

remMethod.val: mo(马) + saic(赛克) + s → 马赛克

trans.tranOther: A mosaic is a design which consists of small pieces of coloured glass, pottery, or stone set in concrete or plaster
